abstract: LinkedIn's new product, Talent Pipeline, is an effort to centralize the way recruiters find, track and stay in touch with potential hires and promotions.
snippet: LinkedIn's new product, Talent Pipeline, is an effort to centralize the way recruiters find, track and stay in touch with potential hires and promotions.
lead_paragraph: LinkedIn, the social network for businesspeople, is adding on to its biggest business: matching jobs to job seekers.

headline.main: LinkedIn Wants to Make More Money From Job Recruiters
